description:
A blend for those who like a bit of kick in their hot chocolate mix: pure cocoa complemented with chili, ginger and cinnamon.Certified fair trade, organic and kosher.Ingredients: golden cane sugar, cocoa powder, cinnamon, ginger, chili, vanilla powder. May contain traces of dairy products, egg, soy and wheat.

        Sustainability








Organic








                      Organically grown content
name: Cocoa Camino Organic Fair Trade Chili  & Spice Hot Chocolate
